main event: A disc-like object was observed hovering over Dallas, Texas, and then accelerated at high speed and flew out of sight.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a reliable witness, an airline pilot, and several police officers., The object was described as being about 30 feet in diameter and very bright and luminous., The object appeared to be metallic and was seen hovering silently for about 30 seconds., There was no sound associated with the object throughout the observation., The incident was reported to the Aerial Phenomena Group for further investigation.
witness description: an airline pilot and several police officers
